page.title: 10Health in Gwyddelwern
page.content: The majority of Gwyddelwern area's health needs are served by the{Corwen {Health Centre}3 miles away. It is a purpose built building staffed by{2 General Practioners}and a{Doctor from the Wrexham Vocational training scheme. No clinics are held in the village. Those not attending Corwen Centre obtain treatment from one of 7 Doctors in 3 Practices in{Ruthin,}9 miles away. The nearest large {Hospitals}are at Wrexham, St. Asaph and a new Hospital at Bodelwyddan. {Dental care}is available at Ruthin & Corwen, where there are 3 fulltime Dentists. There are{3 District Midwives,}a {Physiotherapist}and a{Health Visitor based at Corwen, who attend patients at home when necessary. Dr. Betty Gibbs.
